item.title: Secure git hosting with gitosis
item.description: I hope you are already using ssh keys, but just in case your not go ahead and generate one with ssh-keygen -t rsa (you should do this on your local box) You may as well go ahead and copy your publick key to your git server now as well. scp ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub gitserver:/tmp/ Log into your gitosis server ssh gitserver Make sure setuptools is installed sudo aptitude install python-setuptools
